skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 30% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 15%.
skills.name: Drake's Swiftness
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Wingbeat Flurry

Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Revives an ally with 50% HP and places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on them for 2 turns.
skills.name: Phoenix Rite

skills.desc: Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP at the start of each turn. Also places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on a random ally for 2 turns.
skills.name: Boundless Life [P]
